profile.name: Molindu Achintha
profile.title: Full Stack Developer & ML Engineer
profile.bio: I am a passionate Full Stack Developer and Machine Learning Engineer with a First Class Honours degree in Computer Science. I specialize in building modern web applications and integrating AI/ML capabilities to create intelligent user experiences.

projects.title: AI Portfolio Website
projects.description: A personal portfolio with an AI-powered chat interface that uses RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) to answer questions about my projects and experience. Built with React, FastAPI, Pinecone, and Gemini API.
projects.long_description: This project transforms a traditional portfolio into an interactive AI experience. Users can ask natural language questions about my work, and the AI retrieves relevant context from a vector database before generating accurate, personalized responses.

projects.title: EdTech RAG Pipeline
projects.description: An end-to-end Retrieval-Augmented Generation pipeline for an educational technology platform. Supports multimodal inputs including PDFs, images, and audio transcriptions.
projects.long_description: Designed and implemented a production-ready RAG system that processes educational content from multiple sources. Features OCR for image text extraction, ASR for audio transcription, and intelligent chunking for optimal retrieval.

projects.title: Film Shooting Schedule Optimizer
projects.description: A constraint programming solution for optimizing film production schedules. Uses OR-Tools CP-SAT solver to find optimal shooting orders while respecting actor availability and location constraints.
projects.long_description: This optimization tool helps film production teams create efficient shooting schedules. It considers actor availability windows, location grouping, scene dependencies, and cost factors to generate feasible and optimized production plans.

projects.title: 3D MRI Super-Resolution
projects.description: A deep learning project focused on enhancing the resolution of 3D MRI scans using GANs (Generative Adversarial Networks).
projects.long_description: This research project aims to improve medical imaging diagnosis by generating high-resolution 3D MRI volumes from low-resolution inputs. It utilizes advanced computer vision techniques and deep learning models to preserve anatomical details.

experience.description: Developed and maintained full-stack web applications. Implemented AI/ML features to enhance user experience.
responsibilities: Built RESTful APIs using FastAPI and Node.js
Integrated machine learning models into production systems
Optimized database queries and system performance

education.description: Specialized in Artificial Intelligence and Software Engineering. Completed thesis on Machine Learning applications.
